name: Wrike
description: Advanced project management & collaboration tools for Enterprise and SMB. Get our Productivity Killers eBook: http://t.co/6vbfQXcbNM #projectmanagement #PMOT

apis.name: Wrike
apis.description: Wrike.com offers a social project management software that allows businesses to manage over 50 projects in one workspace with the goal to increase team collaboration and productivity and overall efficiency. The Wrike API platform allows clients to build custom applications on top of existing Wrike software features. It offers seven callable API methods and endpoints: Profile, Contacts, Folders, Tasks, Comments, Attachments, Time Logs.
